hotels.name: Ananda in the Himalayas

hotels.longDesc: A luxury wellness resort in the Himalayas offering transformative Ayurvedic treatments rooted in ancient Indian healing traditions.
hotels.address: The Palace Estate, Narendra Nagar, Uttarakhand 249175, India

hotels.name: Ennismore Hotels - India
hotels.desc: Ennismore's India debut, luxury hospitality expansion to Asia

hotels.name: Lake Pichola Palace Hotel
hotels.desc: Floating palace on Lake Pichola, serene waters, palatial luxury, architectural grandeur

hotels.address: Lake Pichola, Pichola, Udaipur, Rajasthan 313004, India

hotels.name: Ancient Fortress Resort
hotels.desc: Five-star resort built from ancient fortress, heritage architecture, palatial grandeur, luxury experience
hotels.longDesc: An exclusive five-star resort constructed within an ancient fortress, blending historical heritage with modern luxury and palatial elegance for discerning travelers.

hotels.name: Villa Palladio Jaipur
hotels.desc: Newly opened luxury villa with bold patterns, fantasy aesthetic, magical ambiance

hotels.address: Abhay Niwas Palace Sumel, Jamdoli Chouraha, Sumel, Beermalpura at Mukandpura, Rajasthan 302031, India

hotels.name: Aman-I-Khas

hotels.longDesc: An exclusive wilderness resort on the edge of Ranthambore National Park where dusk brings crackling fires and opportunities to spot tigers, leopards, and deer in the pristine jungle surroundings.
hotels.address: Village- Sherpur, near Ranthambore National Park, Khilchipur, Sawai Madhopur, Rajasthan 322001, India

hotels.name: Shakti Himalaya
hotels.desc: Himalayan wellness retreat, mountain tranquility, spiritual winter escape

hotels.address: 903, Vatika City Point, MG Road, Sector - 25, Sushant Lok Phase I, Sector 25, Gurugram, Haryana 122009, India

hotels.name: Six Senses Vana
hotels.desc: Himalayan wellness retreat, Ayurvedic programs, transformative experiences

hotels.address: Mussoorie Rd, Malsi, Dehradun, Uttarakhand 248009, India

hotels.name: Shakti Himalaya

experiences.name: Ranthambore National Park
experiences.desc: Protected wildlife sanctuary, tiger habitat, diverse jungle fauna, untouched wilderness
experiences.longDesc: A renowned national park harboring tigers, leopards, and diverse wildlife species within pristine brushwood forest and jungle landscape.

experiences.longDesc: India's most magnificent palace offers families a glimpse into royal heritage with stunning architecture. The evening light show creates magical memories for children exploring ornate halls.

markets.longDesc: Mysore's most colorful market pulses with energy and tradition, offering families an immersive cultural experience. Aromatic spices, vibrant silks, and local crafts create sensory adventures for children.

a.name: Rajasthan's Royal Palaces & Tigers (10 Days)
a.description: A magical family journey through India's most enchanting palaces, wildlife safaris searching for Bengal tigers, and lakeside luxury that will captivate children and parents alike.
